data.text:
Sakura Laurel and I were heading to the 
course to start with her training when――
data.processed:
<story>Sakura Laurel and I were heading to the 
<story>course to start with her training when――

data.text:
In any case, I'm going to make the announcement……! 
And you can proceed with installing the machine!
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>In any case, I'm going to make the announcement……! 
<story>And you can proceed with installing the machine!

data.text: You two, what's wrong? Did something happen?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>You two, what's wrong? Did something happen?

data.text:
I see, so a mistake was made with the order. 
And the machines were supposed to be unveiled today?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I see, so a mistake was made with the order. 
<story>And the machines were supposed to be unveiled today?

data.text:
Yes……we announced that 5 would be installed but only 1 made it…… 
Everyone came to see them, but how should I explain it……?
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>Yes……we announced that 5 would be installed but only 1 made it…… 
<story>Everyone came to see them, but how should I explain it……?

data.text: Did you ask the President?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Did you ask the President?

data.text:
The President and Vice President are dealing with another 
matter today so I can't contact them. Today was supposed 
to be a special event too, and now it'll go to waste――!
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>The President and Vice President are dealing with another 
<story>matter today so I can't contact them. Today was supposed 
<story>to be a special event too, and now it'll go to waste――!

data.text: Why's that? Even with just one machine it should be plenty of fun!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Why's that? Even with just one machine it should be plenty of fun!

data.text: ……Huh?
data.name: Both
data.processed: <story>……Huh?

data.text:
Because, aren't there plenty of ways to make it more fun!? 
For example, let's see――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Because, aren't there plenty of ways to make it more fun!? 
<story>For example, let's see――

data.text:
How about turning it in to a record keeping event? 
How does that sound?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>How about turning it in to a record keeping event? 
<story>How does that sound?

data.text:
Comparing your current numbers against others can help you get 
a clear picture of your current situation and makes it easier 
to set goals! And it will let everyone try out the machine!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Comparing your current numbers against others can help you get 
<story>a clear picture of your current situation and makes it easier 
<story>to set goals! And it will let everyone try out the machine!

data.text:
With her positive attitude and flexible thinking……I couldn't 
help but agree. To help with her idea, right now I should――
data.processed:
<story>With her positive attitude and flexible thinking……I couldn't 
<story>help but agree. To help with her idea, right now I should――

data.text: B-but will everyone agree with that……?
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume B

choices.text: I can help with that! Let's do it!
I can help with that! Let's do it!

data.processed: <story>B-but will everyone agree with that……?

data.text:
――! Fufu, if Trainer-san is helping, 
then there's nothing to worry about!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>――! Fufu, if Trainer-san is helping, 
<story>then there's nothing to worry about!

data.text:
See? It'll be fine! 
Let's make this a great event!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>See? It'll be fine! 
<story>Let's make this a great event!

data.text: Eeeh, there's only one machine!?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

choices.text: That's why we're doing record keeping!

data.processed: <story>Eeeh, there's only one machine!?

data.text:
I see……but, the girl I'm responsible for hasn't debuted yet, 
so to make her compete against already experienced girls is……
data.name: Rookie Trainer A

choices.text: We're going to divide it based on grade!
choices.processed: <size=41>We're going to divide it based on grade!</size>

data.processed:
<story>I see……but, the girl I'm responsible for hasn't debuted yet, 
<story>so to make her compete against already experienced girls is……

data.text:
I see…… 
In that case, well……
data.name: Trainers
data.processed:
<story>I see…… 
<story>In that case, well……

data.text:
I move about frantically trying to talk to everyone involved. 
I was desperate to make sure Sakura Laurel's idea worked out.
data.processed:
<story>I move about frantically trying to talk to everyone involved. 
<story>I was desperate to make sure Sakura Laurel's idea worked out.

data.text:
――With all the preparations completed, 
the training event began!
data.processed:
<story>――With all the preparations completed, 
<story>the training event began!

data.text:
――Well then, the record keeping for the new machine, the Tire 
Flip is beginning~! We'll start with the senior class girls! 
I'll count how many times you can do it in one minute!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>――Well then, the record keeping for the new machine, the Tire 
<story>Flip is beginning~! We'll start with the senior class girls! 
<story>I'll count how many times you can do it in one minute!

data.text:
Alright, I'll go first! 
I'll do it~~!!
data.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Alright, I'll go first! 
<story>I'll do it~~!!

data.text:
Hmmph! ――Doriyaah! 
Guu-……aaah!!
data.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Hmmph! ――Doriyaah! 
<story>Guu-……aaah!!

data.text:
――5, 4, 3, 2, 1, that's it! 
Your count is……Ooooh, 22 times!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>――5, 4, 3, 2, 1, that's it! 
<story>Your count is……Ooooh, 22 times!

data.text:
Amazing……it really did become 『Fun』…… 
everyone seems motivated……
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Amazing……it really did become 『Fun』…… 
<story>everyone seems motivated……

data.text:
Um, I hope this event will be held again! 
It's really interesting and invigorating!
data.name: Senior Class Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Um, I hope this event will be held again! 
<story>It's really interesting and invigorating!

data.text:
O-……Okay! 
The student council will consider it!
data.name: Student Council Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>O-……Okay! 
<story>The student council will consider it!

data.text:
The event was a great success. Everyone seemed 
to be able to get valuable data, a few of the 
trainers thanked me for this opportunity too.
data.processed:
<story>The event was a great success. Everyone seemed 
<story>to be able to get valuable data, a few of the 
<story>trainers thanked me for this opportunity too.

data.text:
Looks like it'll all wrap up without issue, Trainer-san! 
Thank you very much for helping arrange things……!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Looks like it'll all wrap up without issue, Trainer-san! 
<story>Thank you very much for helping arrange things……!

data.text:
And, I'm sorry! 
For acting on my own and causing trouble for you.
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: No, I'm glad I could help you
No, I'm glad I could help you

data.processed:
<story>And, I'm sorry! 
<story>For acting on my own and causing trouble for you.

data.text:
Of course! 
Because Trainer-san worked so hard, everything went well!
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: It's because of your positive attitude
It's because of your positive attitude

data.processed:
<story>Of course! 
<story>Because Trainer-san worked so hard, everything went well!

data.text:
――……Fufu. 
Then, I guess that means it was both of us together♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>――……Fufu. 
<story>Then, I guess that means it was both of us together♪

data.text:
After that, Sakura Laurel also participated―― 
making it a fulfilling training session.
data.processed:
<story>After that, Sakura Laurel also participated―― 
<story>making it a fulfilling training session.
